trials.page_content: Dax is a lot like Earth.  Like Earth it has seven continents, in similar locations, but instead of North
America, South America, Africa, Europe, Asia, Australia, and Antarctica, the continents are
called  Aga,  Benli, Caro, Dodi, Ente, Fale, and Gomi. Its climate is a lot like Earth's, too. But the
plants and animals of Dax are quite different.
The weather on Dax is very constant, not changing much from day to day. Occasionally, there will
trials.predicate_1: result in permanent damage to the plants and animals on Dax

trials.page_content: be tremendous ice storms that freeze over the entire planet. These ice storms never last long
trials.predicate_1: result in permanent damage to the plants and animals on Dax

trials.page_content: or result in permanent damage to the plants and animals on Dax. However, the ice storms make the entire sky as dark as night
trials.predicate_1: result in permanent damage to the plants and animals on Dax

trials.page_content: and they frighten most of the animals on Dax.

trials.page_content: Wint lived a long time ago in the mountains. He loved to travel, and
trials.query_predicate_1: result in permanent damage to the plants and animals on Dax

trials.page_content: and that rescued the ancient alien artifact from the city.

trials.page_content: Lorches have massive beaks and are found on the continents of Dodi and Gomi. The two continents
are quite different in what kinds of animals are available for them to eat. Lorches have long wings
and fly only at night.
Kaples are small animals that live in the jungles. They are most active
at dawn and at dusk, when their usual predators are less active. Their thick fur helps camouflage
them among the plants on the forest floor. Kaples have striped fur
and long tails.
The morseth is an animal that lives part of its life in the sea and part of its life on land. Most morseths
trials.predicate_2: come on land to find mates

trials.page_content: come on land to find mates and to bury their dead. Most morseths build permanent structures called fendles in order to bury their dead

trials.page_content: Landeks are very fierce creatures. When the aliens encounter landeks in the wild, they usually run away
trials.query_predicate_2: come on land to find mates

trials.page_content: quickly. Landeks often fight with each other over territory, food, or mates. They fight using the long horns on their heads and on their
trials.query_predicate_2: come on land to find mates

trials.page_content: backs. Landeks have four horns
trials.query_predicate_2: come on land to find mates

trials.page_content: and seven horns.

trials.page_content: Wopis are extremely rare creatures. They only live in the desert and
they all are very hard to find. Wopis sleep during the day to avoid
the heat, and look for food at night when it's cool.
The aliens have many different kinds of specialized skills and trades, such as basket weaving. Crafters are found all over Dax, but

trials.predicate_2: are part of the Farza guild

trials.page_content: Ollers spend most of their lives in water, but occasionally come on land to gather berries. Ollers use tools on land but have a difficult
trials.query_predicate_1: live on the continent of Caro

trials.page_content: time making them. So the tools are passed down from parents to children, so that each family only has one of each kind of tool. Baby
trials.query_predicate_1: live on the continent of Caro

trials.query_predicate_1: live on the continent of Caro

trials.page_content: Mupors are very social creatures. Most of them live in extended family groups consisting of
multiple generations. Most of them also build large triangular rebos
made of clay and grass.
Reesles are strange, furry creatures, often found in the homes of the aliens. They are not house pets
but quasi-domesticated animals. They will steal food from you if you are not paying attention. They have
special headgear to help other aliens identify their owners. Around their heads, they wear giant wutsats
and krevnors.
Zorxon is the overlord of Dax.  Everyone loves Zorxon because she
provides for all the aliens of Dax. However, Zorxon is now very old
and she rarely makes public appearances anymore. Still, she is very influential.
Kazzes are a kind of plant that grow all over Dax. They produce fruit in the springtime, but the
fruit is poisonous to animals. No feps eat kazzes nor do they come close. Kazzes can be highly toxic
and this poison is a defensive mechanism for kazzes.
Batozes are large birds that are found along all the coasts of Dax. They are skilled hunters and
can fly for whole days without stopping. They use their sharp claws to hunt for fish. They also
have special wings that are light but powerful. Batozes have six wings
and can flap their wings very fast.
Zorf the mapmaker lives in the large forest city of Astom. In Astom, there are many ways to get
trials.predicate_1: use the tunnels to get around town

trials.page_content: from place to place, but the most popular way is through tunnels. All of the Astom aliens use the tunnels
trials.predicate_1: use the tunnels to get around town

trials.page_content: to get around town from their homes in the residential quarter. Since all of the Astom aliens live there, it's peaceful during the day
trials.predicate_1: use the tunnels to get around town

trials.page_content: but very crowded at night.
trials.predicate_1: use the tunnels to get around town

trials.page_content: Fengnors are smaller, nocturnal creatures. They often hide under the leaves of short trees to avoid
trials.query_predicate_1: use the tunnels to get around town

trials.page_content: being seen by larger predators. They scrape the bark off trees to eat. They have highly complex
trials.query_predicate_1: use the tunnels to get around town

trials.page_content: mating habits. They mate for life, and the males often bring twigs and leaves to the females during
trials.query_predicate_1: use the tunnels to get around town

trials.page_content: courtship. The mated pairs use these twigs and leaves to build their quite elaborate nests in gluers
trials.query_predicate_1: use the tunnels to get around town

trials.page_content: and watch over them carefully.

Learned about different plants and animals and tried to remember complex names and descriptions of the plants/animals and their habits.

subject_information.problems: The question about he 4 claws vs sever claws was confusing to me. It stated that they had 4 and 7 claws then I had to use a slider to tell what percentage had 4 and what percentage had seven. To me, by the sound of having 4 and seven claws, it didn't sound like "either or" but that the creatures had 4 claws and 7 claws (perhaps at different parts of their bodies). That was my only confusion.
